column1: # Name: FGM/C prevalence among girls and women (%)
# Definition: Most types of FGM/C involve the cutting and removal of portions of the female genitalia. % of women and girls affected.
# Source: UNICEF, Female Genital Mutilation/Cutting: A statistical overview and exploration of the dynamics of change, July 2013
# Data from the No Ceilings project: http://noceilings.org
# For more about the data, please visit http://noceilings.org/data
